channel.title: [Remix Challenge] IVO - Structure (Remixes)
channel.description:
Hey there, Auxians!
I recently released my first **official** [album](https://soundcloud.com/official_ivo/sets/structure) and I'd love hear everyone's take on some of the tracks!
For this, just comment or DM me a song you're interested in remixing (except _S.E.X_), I'll send you the auxy project (and vocals if needed) and you've got until 02.17 to submit your remix (attach the link back into this thread). I'll post all of the submissions on that day.
Can't wait to hear what you guys come up with! Cheers!
_IVO_
P.S. Please note that if you choose to participate, you will receive custom cover art to go with your remix.

item.title: [Remix Challenge] IVO - Structure (Remixes)
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
Thank you IVO for hosting this wicked challenge and giving us a chance to delve into the styles of your work. Congrats to @Xiejra and @Goxenar , man it’s hard to believe im up here with you guys, you both did tremendously well and have inspired me further to take my atmospheric sound to a higher level. It was a blast and I can hardly believe I "speedrun"ed my entry to the last minute!
And congratulations to everyone who put in such hard work and commitment into finishing these amazing tracks, I’m still listening and having a great time myself. I can’t even begin to imagine how IVO was able to pick between everyone!

Read full topic

item.title: [Remix Challenge] IVO - Structure (Remixes)
item.dc:creator: xavior
item.description:
Hey everyone!

After receiving a number of requests to remix a variety of songs from my new album, I have compiled most of the best submissions I’ve received thus far and would like to announce the top three winners of the remix challenge I issued a week ago.

You can listen to all of the wonderful remixes here!

First off, thank you to all who have showed such amazing support for my work up to this point. The Auxy community, small as it is, has provided endless encouragement. I’m inspired by everyone’s growth, commentary, and commitment. Pretty sure no one picked up on this, but the title track actually is a testament to us. We are community, we are family. Despite every dispute and our personal adversities, we all come here for one reason. To make music and build each other up. Our music are our silent screams “whispering through the cracks”, and you all have helped “pull me through.” <3

Now, without further ado, I’d like to announce my top three remixes from STRUCTURE:

In 3rd PLACE - Goxenar’s Remix of Dream Within a Dream - A powerful take on the chillout track gave a whole new feel to the emotional vibe of the original song. I was utterly blown away by the quality of the mix and the choice of instruments. Fantastic work, @Goxenar.

In 2nd PLACE - Kerfuffle’s Speedrun Remix of Blink - A driving beat with poppy chiptune vibes completely flipped the sinister original. I absolutely admire the production quality. Great job, @Kerfuffle.

And In 1st PLACE - Xiejra’s Remix of Don’t Save Me - A mind-blowing experimental banger that totally stole the show. Taking the minimal original and supercharging it with new encapsulating melodies and dubstep-like drops was an awe-inspiring demonstration of unique style and pure creativity. Congratulations, @Xiejra, and thank you!

Thank you again to everyone else who participated. Your take on my work was nothing short of amazing. I loved each and every piece for what it had to offer. I hope to hear more remixes of songs from Structure in the future!

IVO

Read full topic
